name: n8n-nodes-base.microsoftGraphSecurity
semantic_context: Consume the Microsoft Graph Security API

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Get
options.action: Get a secure score control profile

options.name: Get Many
options.action: Get many secure score control profiles

options.name: Update
options.action: Update a secure score control profile

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

secureScoreId.name: secureScoreId
secureScoreId.description: ID of the secure score to retrieve
secureScoreId.ai_hint: ID of the secure score to retrieve

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters
filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

secureScoreControlProfileId.name: secureScoreControlProfileId
secureScoreControlProfileId.description: ID of the secure score control profile to update
secureScoreControlProfileId.ai_hint: ID of the secure score control profile to update

provider.name: provider
provider.description: Name of the provider of the security product or service
provider.ai_hint: Name of the provider of the security product or service

vendor.name: vendor
vendor.description: Name of the vendor of the security product or service
vendor.ai_hint: Name of the vendor of the security product or service

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: state
options.description: Analyst driven setting on the control

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'secureScore' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'secureScoreId'
IF resource == 'secureScore' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'secureScore' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'secureScore' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'secureScoreControlProfileId'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'secureScoreControlProfileId'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'provider'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'vendor'
IF resource == 'secureScoreControlProfile' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
